sentence: Again give it a try nice and quiet clean good restaurant close by many downtown attractions
If you are lucky enough to live in the Cincinnati area and are a foodie the Palace Restaurant at the Cincinatian should not be missed
Great location near the theatre with a lot of dining options nearby
Cozy and friendly bar for a drink
Ideal location downtown restaurants near by 5 minute walk to stadium Bar area renovation
Our room was beautiful and we were within walking distance of many downtown sights and restaurants
There is a nice bar and restaurant
We went to the bar area after the game and the service was top notch
Nice breakfast of two eggs three sausage links two large pieces of bacon potatoes toast and coffee for 15
This is a beautiful old hotel in downtown Cincinnati and is within walking distance of many great restaurants and Fountain Square where there are lots of activities

The bathroom In walking distance of many restaurants and businesses
Had complimentary bottled water and cliff bar in the morning
Booked on hotel tonight that advertised bar restaurant room service
Breakfast was provided in a hotel next door and it was adequate
The hotel is under construction the lobby the common spaces and the restaurant
The young lady said all the rooms were done but the restaurant was not finished
We were sent to another hotel to receive our free breakfast and were only offered ‘ free ’ lukewarm bottled waters as an apology for the mess construction going on
Did not stay at the hotel but the restaurant was excellent
There ’s a mini mart and Hilton Honors VIPs entitled to breakfast get a pre made low end breakfast sandwich to go
The owners missed a huge chance for a marquee restaurant
After waiting 30 minutes for our breakfast we simply had to leave for an appointment

Nice hotel recently updated lobby and restaurants and some room renovations as well although they could have done better with the rooms as it appears they went cheap on the flooring in the bedroom half of the room also mini bar was non existent would have thought a room at this price point would have at least had a couple bottles of water for guest
After checking in our group went to the bar for a few drinks
Bar Restaurant I was going to post a review separately for Brick and Mortar but could not find them listed on Trip Advisor
The mic ultra was no longer warm so we had a couple and moved onto another bar
Restaurant was understaffed for our large group over a 40 minute wait for waffles which were served COLD

So at that point we looked at what was supposed to happen with the wine and the strawberries and we agreed that breakfast in the morning might have cost us more money and more grief then trying to just get it so we decided to go elsewhere for our breakfast
Brick and Mortar bar and restaurant is under staffed and over priced
The restaurant staff was no different small menu but a good variety of options for both food and drink
